    • Constructor Detail

      • UDPSocket

        public UDPSocket(jdk.nashorn.api.scripting.ScriptObjectMirror currentObj,
                 boolean enableBroadcast)
        Construct a socket.
        Parameters:
        currentObj - The corresponding JavaScript Socket object.
        enableBroadcast - enabling or not message broadcasting

    • Method Detail

      • bind

        public void bind(int port,
                 java.lang.String address,
                 jdk.nashorn.api.scripting.ScriptObjectMirror callback)
        Listen for datagram messages on the specified port and optional address. Once binding is complete, a 'listening' event is emitted and the optional callback function is called.
        Parameters:
        port - The port number.
        address - The address of the network interface on which to listen, or "0.0.0.0" to listen on all addresses.
        callback - A callback function to invoke when the binding is complete, or null to not request a callback.

      • close

        public void close()
        Close the UDP socket.

      • send

        public void send(java.lang.Object data,
                 int port,
                 java.lang.String hostname,
                 jdk.nashorn.api.scripting.ScriptObjectMirror callback)
        Send a datagram message.
        Parameters:
        data - The data to send.
        port - The destination port.
        hostname - The name of the destination host (a hostname or IP address).
        callback - An optional callback function to invoke when the send is complete, or if an error occurs. In the latter case, the cause of the error will be passed as an argument to the callback.

      • setRawBytes

        public void setRawBytes(boolean rawBytes)
        Set raw bytes support. If this is not called, the attribute defaults to false.
        Parameters:
        rawBytes - The value of rawBytes.

      • setReceiveType

        public void setReceiveType(java.lang.String type)
        Set the receive type. If this is not called, the type defaults to "string".
        Parameters:
        type - The name of the receive type.

      • setSendType

        public void setSendType(java.lang.String type)
        Set the send type. If this is not called, the type defaults to "string".
        Parameters:
        type - The name of the send type.

      • _emitMessage

        protected void _emitMessage(io.vertx.core.buffer.Buffer buffer,
                            java.lang.String sender)
        Convert the buffer to a message depending on the specified receive type and emit a 'message' event. Both the message and sender address are emitted.
        Parameters:
        buffer - The buffer containing the message.
        sender - A string containing the IP address and port of the sender.
